Dear Client,
Love to Read, Supply Desk's new Reading Intervention Programme, is proven to boost pupil progress. Book your tailored Love to Read intervention before the end of term and receive £500 of book vouchers for your school.
Boost a pupil’s reading age Raise attainment Improve literacy skills Provide encouragement Build confidence Improve behaviour Enable pupils to access the full curriculum
Pupil Progress Guaranteed Progress Promise! Once the Love to Read programme has been completed, we guarantee pupils will make progress (or we’ll rebate you £1,000).
What is the Love to read programme?
Designed for pupils aged 6-15 20-minute sessions, twice a week Delivered by Teaching Assistants and Teachers who have been ‘Love to Read’ trained (bespoke training - provided by Creative Education) Structured one-to-one intervention for learners who find reading difficult Proven to more than double rates of progress
